title: Welcome to my portfolio of projects!
text:
I’m still working to polish up web-friendly pages for a variety of my past projects. If you’re looking for a specific type of work product, but I haven’t added it here yet, please reach out so I can provide the source material!

 Hire me!

title: Some critters I’ve spotted
text:
A juvenile black-tailed deer (Odocoileus hemionus columbianus) at Sand Point in Olympic National Park



















A marten (Martes american) spotted near Nederland, CO







A marten (Martes american) spotted near Nederland, CO









The same baby deer (Odocoileus hemionus columbianus) from the top of this page







A northern spotted owl (Strix occidentalis caurina) I followed to its nest on Mt Hood









A little brown bat (Myotis californianus) affixed with a wing band to monitor roost fidelity at Mt Rainier







A baby gelada monkey (Theropithecus gelada) in the Ethiopian highlands









An adult male gelada monkey (Theropithecus gelada) in the Ethiopian highlands







An adult male gelada monkey (Theropithecus gelada) in the Ethiopian highlands









River otters (Lontra candensis) near Asgard Pass in the Washington Cascades







An Olympic marmot (Marmota olympus) resting after a long day of getting stuck in visitors’ cars









A female barred owl (Strix varia) nesting outside my cabin at Mt Rainier







A female barred owl (Strix varia) nesting outside my cabin at Mt Rainier









The elsuive portrait of an American pika (Ochotona princeps) living in the shadow of Asgard Pass in the Washington Cascades
